headline: Omnicom and Interpublic Finalize Agreement with FTC
summary: Today, Omnicom Group Inc. ("Omnicom") (NYSE: OMC) and The Interpublic Group of Companies, Inc. ("IPG") (NYSE: IPG) are pleased to announce that after a public comment period the United States Federal Trade Commission has finalized its agreement with Omnicom and IPG on a mutually acceptable consent order.
